primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The Divine Council (Gods/God) makes a sovereign decision to install a new King (Jesus) to transform the world from a state of dread and 'business as usual' to a state of glory and peace.

tekstueel_bewijs: The gods have met and they have made a new decision.
Christmas is the celebration of the new decision of God.
God intends other ways for us to live.

object.identificatie: A New World Order (Peace, Glory, Wholeness)
tekstueel_bewijs: A zone of wholeness in which we can live our lives.
The new shape of the world.

zender.identificatie: The Divine Council (The Source of Decree)
tekstueel_bewijs: They decided who would be king of the gods.
They determined how it was going to be for the new year.
To you is born this day... a Savior.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Receiver (the unsuspecting shepherd).

tekstueel_bewijs: They come to tell what the gods have decided.
The messenger was joined by the chorus.
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject/Sender; the Angels are the functional Helpers/Mediators.
helper.rol_van_geest: Absent; replaced by the 'Angelic' communication of the decree.

tekstueel_bewijs: All the fake kings... Caesar, Herod, Pilate, presidents.
The skies are filled with bombers.
Our sober, sane world of budgets and schedules.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponents are both political powers and the ontological weight of 'weary business as usual' and death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The hearer must 'notice' and 'heed' the message to move from dread to the celebration of the new reality.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The primary program (God's decision) is already actualized; the secondary program is the hearer's cognitive and emotional alignment with that reality.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.subject_naar_object: God → New Shape of the World

voorbeelden_god_subject: God intends other ways for us to live.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We missed out on the angels.
You may wonder how anybody could think that way.

voorbeelden: We have to do with a god who makes promises.
I want to talk about the angels.
The perception that the skies are not filled with bombs.
Notice the angels, heed the message.
Power to transform... power to cause upheaval.
The real decisions are not at our disposal.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on 'Knowing/Perceiving' (Savoir) the 'Power' (Pouvoir) of God's already-enacted decree. It is an epiphany-based theology.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Bombers/Dread) through ~S1 (Sane world/Schedules) to S1 (The New King).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by the 'Fresh Decision' of God which renders the 'Fake Kings' (S2) irrelevant.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the mention of Vietnam and bombing provides a heavy, non-trivial opponent.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. The 'engine' of the story is God's sovereign decision-making in the Divine Council, not human effort or moral improvement.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Notice the angels, heed the message.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The real decisions are not at our disposal.
It is a gift of God... it’s for you.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The shepherds are not models of faith but 'unsuspecting' receivers of an 'unwelcome' power.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: The shepherds are actants of 'Receiver' status, highlighting God's initiative.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of 'making' the world work; shift from dread to awe.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The metaphor of the Divine Council perfectly aligns the Old Testament, the Christmas story, and the contemporary political crisis.
spanning_punten: The transition from 'primitive' mythology to 'modern' political reality is jarring but intentional.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: All the fake kings would be dethroned... he will turn the world back to its sanity.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon focuses on the 'Pouvoir' (Power) of the Decree rather than the indwelling Spirit.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: High; sin is seen as the 'panic-stricken powers' and the 'dread' of the bombers.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully maintains God as the Subject of the primary narrative program. The hearer is correctly positioned as the Receiver of a non-negotiable divine decree.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Slightly more Pouvoir (How the decree enables the hearer to act).
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Connect the 'Peace' of the decree to the hearer's specific 'Pouvoir-faire' in a world of bombers.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God's decree) precedes and founds the Ethics (Peace on earth).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in theocentric preaching that uses a 'primitive' narrative structure to deconstruct modern political despair.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the 'Gosh' anecdote; semiotics reveals the 'Divine Council' as the actantial engine.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the Greek 'angelos'; semiotics focuses on the functional role of 'Messenger' within a power-axis.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Angels' are not characters but functional 'Helpers' of the 'Sender' (God) to change the 'Receiver's' (Hearer) reality.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses 'The Gods' as a semiotic placeholder for the sovereign agency of the Divine.
